data.name: TenantIdToolTipHoverMessage
data.value: This is an auto populated value representing your O365 Tenant.
data.comment: The tooltip hover message for the TenantId.

data.name: WfmApiEndpointToolTipHoverMessage
data.value: Please provide the Kronos WFC API Endpoint.
data.comment: The tooltip hover message for entering the Kronos API Endpoint.

data.name: WfmProviderToolTipHoverMessage
data.value: Please enter the name of your Workforce Management provider. For example, if you plan to register Kronos WFC, enter KronosWFC. Once you are satisfied, fill in the other details and click on Register.
data.comment: The tooltip hover message for the Workforce Management provider.

data.name: WfmSuperUsernameToolTipHoverMessage
data.value: Please provide the Kronos Super Username.
data.comment: The tooltip hover message for entering the Kronos Super Username.

data.name: WfmSuperUserPasswordToolTipHoverMessage
data.value: Please provide the Kronos Super User Password.
data.comment: The tooltip hover message for entering the Kronos Super User Password.

data.name: TokenCacheReuseExceptionMessage
data.value: The cached token cache is for a different user! Make sure the token cache factory is registered as Scoped!
data.comment: The exception message for different user token cache.

data.name: HomePageInstructionText
data.value: Please fill out the form below in order to setup your instance of Kronos WFC 8 to work with Shifts. This is a one-time setup. It is required that you provide the correct SuperUser credentials for Kronos. Once all information has been entered, click on Submit.
data.comment: The instruction text for the home page.

data.name: TeamDepartmentMappingPageInstructionText
data.value: In order to properly map the team & department between Shifts and Kronos, please follow the steps below:
data.comment: The instruction text for the team to department mapping page.

data.name: UserToUserMappingPageInstructionText
data.value: In order to properly map the users between AAD and Kronos, please follow the steps below:
data.comment: The instruction text for the user to user mapping page.

data.name: ImportTeamToDepartmentMappingButtonText
data.value: Import Mapping
data.comment: The button text to import the team to department mapping.

data.name: ImportUserToUserMappingButtonText
data.value: Import Mapping
data.comment: The button text to import the user to user mapping.

data.name: ConfigurationSavedSuccessNextStepsText
data.value: Configuration has been successfully saved! Click on the Register link to register the Kronos Workforce Integration with Microsoft Graph.
data.comment: This content is for having the necessary next steps outlined when the WFI registration has been successful.

data.name: ErrorNotificationHeaderText
data.value: Error
data.comment: This header text is for when there is an error

data.name: KronosErrorContentText
data.value: Unable to login with the provided credentials for Kronos. Please correct and try again!
data.comment: If there is an error logging into Kronos, this is the message that gets thrown.

data.name: SuccessNotificationHeaderText
data.value: Success
data.comment: This header text is for when there is a success

data.name: WFIRegSuccessContentText
data.value: {0} has been successfully registered!
data.comment: The content for the successfully registered workforce integration, and the {0} placeholder represents the DisplayName of the response after the WFI has been registered.

data.name: WFIRegSuccessHeaderText
data.value: Workforce Integration Registration Success
data.comment: This is the header when the workforce integration is registered correctly

data.name: BackButtonText
data.value: Back
data.comment: The button text to move to the previous page

data.name: DoneButtonText
data.value: Done
data.comment: The button text to signify that all of the necessary mappings are done

data.name: NextButtonText
data.value: Next
data.comment: The button text to move to the next page

data.name: NoWfiIdExistsContentText
data.value: There is no Workforce Integration ID to delete. Please make sure that you have an ID in order to delete it.
data.comment: The content text to display if the configuration entity does not have a workforce integration ID associated to it.

data.name: WfiDeletionSuccessText
data.value: The workforce integration: {0} has been deleted successfully!
data.comment: The content to display when the workforce integration has been deleted successfully from the system.

data.name: WFIGeneralHeaderText
data.value: Workforce Integration Registration
data.comment: This header text is for anything related to the Workforce Integration entity

data.name: ConfigurationEntityDeletionSuccessContent
data.value: The configuration has been successfully deleted from the system.
data.comment: The message that the configuration has been deleted from the system.

data.name: FirstTimeSyncSuccessText
data.value: Entities has been successfully synced!
data.comment: Message to show that the entities has been successfully synced.

data.name: ExportUserToUserMappingButtonText
data.value: Export
data.comment: The Export button text in User to user mapping view

data.name: SpreadsheetContentType
data.value: application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet
data.comment: The content type for spreadsheet document

data.name: DownloadTemplateoUserMappingButtonText
data.value: Download Template
data.comment: The text for DownloadTemplate button in UserToUserMapping view

data.name: SetUpNotDoneMessage
data.value: Please verify workforce integration, user mapping, team department mapping are done.

data.name: SetUpSuccessfulMessage
data.value: The sync has initiated successfully.
data.comment: The message when the data sync is successfully initiated.

data.name: UpdateNotificationHeaderText
data.value: Updated successfully!
data.comment: The update successful popup text

data.name: KronosShiftUserMappingXML
data.value: kronos_shift_usermapping.xlsx

data.name: TeamsDepartmentMappingXML
data.value: teams_department_usermapping.xlsx

data.name: SaveShiftsTeamKronosDepartmentMappingAsync
data.value: SaveShiftsTeamKronosDepartmentMappingAsync

data.name: WFIRegFailedContentText
data.value: {0} has been failed to register!

data.name: WFIRegFailedHeaderText
data.value: Workforce Integration Failed to Register!

data.name: WorkforceIntegrationNotRegister
data.value: Workforce Integration is not registered. Please register workforce integration.

data.name: WfiDeletionFailed
data.value: The workforce integration {0} failed to delete.

data.name: NoOfColumnsInTeamsExcel
data.comment: The number of columns in the KronosShiftTeamDeptMappingTemplate.xlsx

data.name: WFIAlreadyRegHeaderText
data.value: Workforce Integration {0} is already registered.

data.name: WFIDeleteFailedDueToTeamDeptMappingText
data.value: Please make sure to delete all the mapped Team/Department before deleting Workforce Integration {0}.

data.name: WFIDeletePopUpMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the selected workforce integration?

data.name: UserMappingDeletePopUpMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the user mapping?

data.name: TeamMappingDeletePopUpMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the selected team?

data.name: UserToUserMappingPageInstructionTextStep1
data.value: Click on the export button - this exports user details in both AAD and Kronos, and will download a file to your local downloads folder.

data.name: UserToUserMappingPageInstructionTextStep2
data.value: Click on the download template button - this will generate an empty Excel file that contains the following columns: (KronosOrgJobPath, KronosPersonNumber, KronosUserName, ShiftAADObjectId, ShiftUserDisplayName, ShiftUserPrincipalName)

data.name: UserToUserMappingPageInstructionTextStep3
data.value: Once the users have been mapped in the template file, click on the import mapping button, select the template file that you recently modified and upload.

data.name: UserToUserMappingPageInstructionTextSubStep2
data.value: Make sure to populate this template file with the users that are going to be mapped. Select respective user details from the exported excel.

data.name: TeamDepartmentMappingPageInstructionTextStep1
data.value: Click on the export button - this exports team & department details in both Shifts and Kronos, and will download a file to your local downloads folder.

data.name: TeamDepartmentMappingPageInstructionTextStep2
data.value: Click on the download template button - this will generate an empty Excel file that contains the following columns: (WorkforceIntegrationId, KronosOrgJobPath, ShiftTeamId, ShiftTeamName, ShiftSchedulingGroupId, ShiftSchedulingGroupName)

data.name: TeamDepartmentMappingPageInstructionTextStep3
data.value: Once the team & department have been mapped in the template file, click on the import mapping button, select the template file that you recently modified and upload.

data.name: TeamDepartmentMappingPageInstructionTextSubStep2
data.value: Make sure to populate this template file with the team & department that are going to be mapped. Select respective team & department details from the exported excel.

data.name: TeamDetailsResponseNullOrEmpty
data.value: Unable to get the teamDetailsResponse
data.comment: The message to show when the request to get team details fails.

data.name: SyncKronosToShiftsError
data.value: The sync could not be initiated.
data.comment: Error message when sync is initiated through done button and endpoint throws an error.

data.name: InvalidKronosURL
data.value: Invalid Kronos URL. Please check the URL and try again.
data.comment: The message will be displayed when provided Kronos URL is incorrect.

data.name: MandatoryCredentialsNotProvided
data.value: Please check the mandatory fields and try again.
data.comment: The message will be shown when the mandatory fields are not filled.

data.name: UnableToFetchConfiguration
data.value: Unable to fetch configuration.
data.comment: The message will be displayed when configuration fetch is failed.

data.name: UnableToLoginToKronos
data.value: Unable to login to Kronos. Please check credentials and try again.
data.comment: The message will be displayed when provided Kronos credentials are incorrect.

data.name: NoOfColumnsInUserExcel
data.comment: The number of columns in the KronosShiftUserMappingTemplate.xlsx
